summary: This is an email chain from July 2020 discussing the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell. It includes congratulations to the prosecution team and notes the significant effort required to build the case against her.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email chain; her arrest is announced and she is described as 'very worthy of criminal prosecution'.

persons.name: Audrey
persons.context: Mentioned as holding a press conference regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest.

events.title: Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested. The email congratulates the team on bringing the case, noting the extraordinary work required as the conduct was very old.

events.title: Press Conference on Maxwell Arrest
events.description: Audrey held a press conference at 12:00 regarding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested on the morning of July 2, 2020.
The prosecution team is congratulated for building a case based on very old conduct, described as requiring extraordinary work, perseverance, and creativity.
A press conference regarding the arrest was held by Audrey on July 2, 2020, at 12:00.
